registerKeyPress(KeyEvent) - Method in class network.Client
Creates a NetworkEvent storing a KeyEvent and writes it to the output.

Creates a NetworkEvent storing a message string and writes it to the output.
removeItem(Item) - Method in class gameworld.entity.Container
Removes an item from the container
removeItem(int) - Method in class gameworld.Player
Removes item form inventory at specified index
removeItem(int) - Method in class network.Client
Creates a NetworkEvent storing one index and writes it, telling the server to remove the item at the index in the players inventory.
removeItemContainer(Player, int, Container) - Method in class gameworld.Game
Removes item at index from container specified
removeItemContainer(int, Container) - Method in class network.Client
Creates a NetworkEvent storing an index and a container and writes it, tells the server to remove said indexes item from the container specified.

Remove the player from the game
removePlayer(Player) - Method in class gameworld.location.Location
Removes a player from the location

respawn() - Method in class gameworld.Player
Drops the players inventory on the ground and then respawns the player in the specified starting location.

rotateCounterClockwise(Tile[][]) - Method in class ui.RenderingWindow
Rotates given array of tiles 90 degrees counter-clockwise.
run() - Method in class network.Client.ServerThread
Continuously tries to read updates from the server if one is found, appropriate methods in gui are called, and the gamestate is updated as required.
run() - Method in class network.Server.ClientThread
Continuously trys to read objects from the client, and if one is read the correct action on the server will be taken.
